title: "We're nerfing Shyvana because she might be too strong with the Devouer changes"
body:
But the Balance team can't preemptively nerf Vladamir and Rumble who will be hilariously broken with the new AP item changes. Rumble is already pick/ban in competetive, not to mention how strong he is in solo queue. Let's also not forget that Vladamir's design is complete cancer and lacks significant counterplay. It's going to be almost impossible to take a vlad down when he gets {{item:3152}}. I guess I'm not allowed to trade with Vladamir anymore. 

*facepalm* This Balance Team sometimes..

Gold player here, I actually experience a lot of success playing top lane shyvana when I play her as a split pushing threat. She's tanky enough to shrug off most of the melee top laners in the current meta and her on-hit damage makes her difficult for some top laners to itemize against if your adc gets fed.

Tbh, most of shyv's damage comes from her burnout and burnout/e on-hit procs. I'm not really sure if she'll be to brawl with other top laners after this nerf goes through if she loses ~100-150 damage per burnout at max rank; additionally, this will nerf her dragon form's burnout trail effect.

WotA will be a buff late game when enemies have significant amount of mr. It won't be a buff in the laning stage. Why? Because you get 15% healing from creeps instead of 20%. That's fairly significant. Most enemies won't have more than 25-30% MR early game anyway. You don't sit there spamming Qs against your enemy unless they're idiots. They either all-in you or stay back, so you end up using Q a lot on creeps to heal yourself. In this situation it's a nerf.

EVEN late game you're likely to have huge amounts of mpen, so it won't be a big buff. 

Even though WotA is better late game against enemies with a good amount of MR, it still won't matter. Why? Because spell vamp doesn't matter that much in team fights. Zhonyas / damage is far more important. Getting 15% of your Q damage and 5% of your E / R damage isn't going  to keep you alive. 

The recent-ish rylais change that made it 400 hp / 100 ap was a far bigger change than this is for vladimir. The Liandrys change will also help him a lot, but rylais will still be more important (especially because it doubles the damage on liandrys...)

Only takes a single MR item and being melee to get 50% reduction. At level 1 as a melee, you have about 30 base, usually with scaling MR glyphs, so you're at about 35 MR. 35 MR is about 26% by itself. Get a 50 MR item first like a SV or Banshee's or even a Maw and you now have about 100 at that point in the game which is 50% reduction. So... yeeaah.
